DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of Fimarsartan on pharmacodynamics, pharmacokinetics, and the safety of warfarin in healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Effect of Fimarsartan on Pharmacodynamics, Pharmacokinetics, and the Safety of Warfarin in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: age: 20 40 years sex: male body weight: greater than 55 kg written informed consent known allergy to Fimasartan and warfarin existing cardiac or hematological diseases existing hepatic and renal diseases existing gastrointestinal diseases acute or chronic diseases which could affect drug absorption or metabolism history of any serious psychological disorder positive drug or alcohol screening smokers of 10 or more cigarettes per day 3 month ago participation in a clinical trial during the last 2 months prior to the start of the study
